name: Nope
text: Nope allows any card in the game to be ignored one time.

name: Clarify
text: Clarify a plot element chosen by the first person to shout what needs clarifying.

name: End Comically
text: End the story comically.

name: End Darkly
text: End the story darkly.

name: End in One Turn
text: End the story.

name: End in Two Turns
text: The story must end in two turns. Draw another card.

name: End Positively
text: End the story with positive overtones.

name: To-be-continuedâ€¦
text: End the story and set it up for a sequel.

name: Loop It
text: Loop back to what was said before

name: Keep going
text: Keep going as if it were the beginning of your turn.

name: Go Deeper
text: Go into greater detail regarding the present story-line.

name: Help Someone
text: Help someone in the story, somehow.

name: Lighten it Up
text: Make the story 'lighter' than it has been recently.

name: Make it Dark
text: Make the story 'darker' than it has been recently.

name: New Character
text: Introduce a new character.

name: Plotline Twist
text: Twist' the plotline in some interesting manner.

name: Recent Events
text: Bring a recent event into the story.

name: Reverse Direction
text: Reverse the direction of the Story after you are done. Draw another card.

name: Time Travel
text: Go to some point forward or backward in time and connect to the present story.

name: Shakespearean Trajedy
text: Kill a major character in the plotline in a tragic manner.

name: Skip Me
text: Skip your Turn.

name: Steal Plot-line
text: When you want to, you can start speaking with the game continuing as you as the present Creator.

name: Switch Character
text: Speak from the perspective of a new or different character.

name: Switch Perspective
text: Change the perspective of the story to a different one. (1st, 2nd, 3rd).

name: Teleport
text: The story continues to the next Creator of your choice. Draw&play another card.

name: Twist
text: The next creator must create a major plot twist to get any review points.

name: Write your own
text: Write a generally accepted rule that stays in the game. Draw&Play another card.

name: Zoom out
text: Create the present story as if it were part of a larger story.

name: Sound Effects
text: Chose a Creator to add sound effects and gain these review points. Draw&play another card.

name: Quiet Listening
text: For one turn, all Listeners may only speak when Creating. If they speak, they must discard all cards they have won.

name: Shhhhh......
text: For one turn, a chosen Listener may only speak on their turn. If they speak, they must discard all cards they have won.

name: Count down 15
text: Finish the story nicely in 20 seconds. Audience to time.

name: Count down 30
text: Finish the story nicely, in any way they want in 30 seconds.

name: Give
text: Creator gets 2 more points if their creation is well reviewed. Draw&play another card.

name: Duet
text: Choose a listener and have a story-related conversation. They gain this card. Draw&play another card.

name: Meta-story
text: Bring a story relating to the Listeners or Creator into the story.

name: Recap
text: Recap the story as if it were the beginning of a new episode in a series.

name: Accelerando
text: For these points, the Next Creator speeds up the story, and pass it to another player quickly. Draw another card.

name: Tongues out
text: For one full round every Creator must tell their story with their tongue out in order to gain points. Draw another card.

name: Tongue out
text: Tell your story with your tongue out in order to gain points.

name: Accent time
text: The next Creator must talk with their best or favorite non-standard accent to any points.

name: Dark Comedy
text: Write into the story that the world has ended in some comical way.

name: 5 minute timer
text: The story must end within 5 minutes

name: Listen
text: The next creator must repeat an exact 5 word phrase from the previous creator, else no points can be won.
